definitions.definition: A transmembrane protein, a novel β-glucuronidase , that, in addition to other effects, provides some control over the sensitivity of the organism to insulin and appears to be involved in aging.

main_definition: A transmembrane protein, a novel β-glucuronidase , that, in addition to other effects, provides some control over the sensitivity of the organism to insulin and appears to be involved in aging. [from 1997]
